column1: This  appeal  is  from  the  judgment,  delivered  by  the  learned  Judge  of  the  High  Court  of
Panadura, dated 12.02.2020, by which, the accused-appellant, was convicted and sentenced
to 2 years rigorous imprisonment in respect of Count 1 and 15 years rigorous imprisonment
The  Accused  Appellant  was  indicted  in  the  High  Court  of  Panadura  along  with  another
accused. The Accused Appellant came to be indicted on the following counts;
